== The bot88 IRC Bot project ==

Developers of this project work on the development and testing of '''bot88''' IRC bot, that would idle at '''#ubuntu-brainstorm''' on network ''irc.freenode.net''
It is a supybot based bot, programmed on python. It supports numerous plugins and has a py-sqlite database.

== Bot Features ==

* Reads from Ubuntu Brainstorm (http://brainstorm.ubuntu.com) RSS feeds and stores newly posted ideas on the Brainstorm website.
* Announces newly posted ideas (checks the feeds every 10 seconds) at #ubuntu-brainstorm
* Can be used for IRC channel administration
* Has a ubottu like encyclopedia support (Database under development)
